name: SHY TALKER - Ludum Dare 46
description:
I've been into game dev about a month now, so I'm a beginner and this is my first game jam, I tried to do something super simple, I hope you like it.

When the theme was reveled I started thinking about a plant, or something  like a bonfire or an animal you need to take care of, but I thought it was kind of unoriginal so I decided to keep something else alive, a conversation.
